A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is a travesty. SPOILERS below:

There is any number of reviews on youtube you can watch to show you all the flaws. Here is a quick recap:

No character growth. Shallow characters that are basically just tropes. A plot that makes no sense and is convoluted..which you know is just horrible\, because how long have they had to write this movie? It must be that it just got into too many hands\, one person could not have written this movie thinking it was good. There is almost nothing good about this movie. A couple good visual scenes. There are jokes that don't belong\, heart warming scenes that are cold as ice because they don't make sense\, and just an overall cavalier attitude was employed in terms of the films consistency\, it requires so much suspension of disbelief that it...who wrote this movie? Why did you do that? It was very unfortunate.
